Package dev.simplix.cirrus.common.container

Interface Container

All Known Implementing Classes:
ItemContainer
public interface Container
A container stores InventoryMenuItemWrappers at a given slot position.

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • itemMap

      Map<Integer,InventoryMenuItemWrapper> itemMap()
      Returns a map collecting all items.
      Returns:
      The map

    • reservedSlots

      Set<Integer> reservedSlots()
      Returns a set with slots that are marked as reserved
      Returns:
      The set

    • capacity

      int capacity()
      Returns the maximum capacity of this container
      Returns:
      the maximum amount of items this container can hold

    • baseSlot

      int baseSlot()
      Returns the initial slot id of this container
      Returns:
      Initial slot id

    • nextFreeSlot

      int nextFreeSlot()
      Returns:
      the slot index of the next available empty slot or -1 if no slot is empty

    • nextFreeSlot

      int nextFreeSlot(int i)
      Returns:
      the slot index of the next available empty slot or -1 after the specified index

    • add

      default void add(InventoryMenuItemWrapper inventoryItemWrapper)
      Sets an item into the next free slot. Free slots are slots where no item has been set and the slot is not marked as reserved.
      Parameters:
      inventoryItemWrapper - The item to set

    • add

      default void add(MenuItemWrapper menuItemWrapper, String actionHandler, List<String> actionArgs)
      Sets an item into the next free slot. Free slots are slots where no item has been set and the slot is not marked as reserved.
      Parameters:
      menuItemWrapper - The item stack to set
      actionHandler - The action handler which should be called on click
      actionArgs - the arguments for that click

    • add

      default void add(CirrusItem model)
      Sets an item into the next free slot. Free slots are slots where no item has been set and the slot is not marked as reserved.
      Parameters:
      model - The item stack model

    • set

      default void set(int slot, InventoryMenuItemWrapper inventoryItemWrapper)
      Sets an item into a given position in the container
      Parameters:
      slot - The slot the item will be located at
      inventoryItemWrapper - The item stack wrapper

    • set

      default void set(int slot, MenuItemWrapper menuItemWrapper, String actionHandler, List<String> actionArgs)
      Sets an item into a given position in the container
      Parameters:
      slot - The slot the item will be located at
      menuItemWrapper - The item stack wrapper
      actionHandler - The handler that handles the click
      actionArgs - Arguments for the action handler

    • set

      default void set(int slot, CirrusItem model)
      Sets an item into a given position in the container
      Parameters:
      slot - The slot the item will be located at
      model - The item stack model

    • get

      default InventoryMenuItemWrapper get(int slot)
      Returns the item stack from the given position
      Parameters:
      slot - slot
      Returns:
      item
